modName: Elaina the Dragon Slayer Follower - Osyotter
summary: Elaina the Dragon Slayer getting some rest and drinks at Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun! However she is ready to go on any adventure to slay dragons or any other beasts!
descriptionHtml:
Elaina the Dragon Slayer getting some rest and drinks at Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun! However she is ready to go on any adventure With You to slay Dragons or any other types of Beasts that you may come across in you adventures!!

Please Pardon with her as sometimes she may call you names using her echo voice ability, she is a little drunk so she really doesn\'t mean it ;).

NOTE: If you select the Vanilla Hair file under the optional section there is no requirements and she will have a vanilla hairstyle, This is a Main File so it will be the only download you need.

Requirements:	
Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion by Radioragae - for Elaina\'s Hair
Link:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110/

Feel Free to upload images of your adventures! Whatever they might be... :o, try to keep them fairly appropriate...
Please Endorse if you enjoyed the mod and leave a comment if you have feedback!
author: osyotter
